::Aerotaur::
     "You are listening to an assassin!  He came to kill a young child who isn't even here.  We faught to defend the Maximal base!"  As he spots the tree he alters to his bird mode and takes to the air.  The tree passes below his legs and crashes into the base wall above the door.  He lands again and returns to his winged centaur mode.  He once again loads an arrow but this time fires it at Burning Hammer.  He can't hurt Recon because he isn't the enemy.
